SEARCH
Module io.inverno.mod.http.server
Package io.inverno.mod.http.server

Interface Part

All Known Subinterfaces:
WebPart
public interface Part

Represents a part in a multipart/form-data request body as defined by RFC 7578.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn
See Also:
  • RequestBody.Multipart

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<String>
    getFilename()
    Returns the part's file name.
    String
    getName()
    Returns the part's name.
    InboundRequestHeaders
    headers()
    Returns the part's headers.
    InboundData<ByteBuf>
    raw()
    Returns the part's raw data.
    InboundData<CharSequence>
    string()
    Returns the part's data as string.

    • getName

      Returns the part's name.

      Returns:
      the name

    • getFilename

      Optional<String> getFilename()

      Returns the part's file name.

      Returns:
      an optional returning the file name or an empty optional if the part is not a file

      Returns the part's headers.
